From: "THECODE" <thecode@...>

Burning Hammer flinches.

Burning Hammer: You are pretty intelligent. I was knew an intelligent
person, but he stole something from me and I chopped his head off with a
stick. That wasn't a threat, I am just telling you some of my stories. Once,
I made this stupid kid cry, you see, I killed his parents, because I was
asked to by a boss of mine, and he cried. I was so annoyed I told him and
the rest of his family that I would come back and kill them. I thought about
it and did go back to kill them, but they had already left, it was a bummer,
it would have been pretty fun to shut that little brat up. And that damned
cranky old man! So, what's your name? I'm Burning Hammer, but you can call
me...Burning Hammer! Ahahahaaaa!! Yeah, I'm funny...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Rudra656@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, November 24, 2000 10:11 PM
Subject: Re: Assassin and Llama


> ::Lambda::
>     "I understand completely.  You do what you're told only to gain more
> power for yourself.  You're very shrewd, that's good."
>
>
>
